1.0 out of 5 stars
Pirated Game + Misleading Product Image
ByHarsh Rathodon 6 May 2016
Verified Purchase
I was expecting original one but it was pirated. The game is not the one as sold by UBIsoft. The seller is producing illegal copies of this game without any license from UBIsoft. Also this game has been downloaded from internet by the seller. When I had recieved it; it wasn't even packed in it's own unique box as sold by UBIsoft with Map or Manuals. But was delivered to me in some cheap DVD cover on which the seller printed this games's cover as you can see in the images above. Moreover, the game and the fack printed game-manual in it were in Russian language making the installation and playing further complicated. The seller even removed the UBIsoft logo and put his own on the DVD cover. I'm very disappointed and I didn't expect it from amazon.
2 Comments
|

5.0 out of 5 stars
Assassin's Creed (PC)
ByKumaron 22 November 2014
Verified Purchase
Nice graphics and a good game to play enjoying it a lot.
You'll need a graphics card to play this game with following system requirements;
Processor - Dual Core 2.6 GHz Intel Pentium D or AMD Athelon 64 X2 3800 + ( Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 GHz or AMD Athelon 64 X2 4400 or better recommended)
RAM - 1GB (For Windows XP), 2GB ( For Vista) *No details found for playing in Windows 7/8/8.1 ( But I can play it in Windows 7 x32)
Video Card - 256 MB DirectX 10.0 Compliant video card or DirectX 9.0 Compliant Card with Shader Model 3.0 or Higher
Sound card - DirectX 9.00 or 10.0 compliant sound card (5.1 sound card recommended)
DVD ROM - Dual Layer
HDD Space - 8GB
Comment
|

5.0 out of 5 stars
one word for this game-"awesome"
ByAmazon Customeron 3 December 2016
Verified Purchase
Got the product on time...installation was quite simple...just took few minutes to install..no additional download required for the game since it is a non steam game
Rating of the product
Story-10
Combat-10
Weapons-10
Graphics-10 ( looks great when you play in high settings )
The game introduces a good combat system...missions are interesting however the missions becomes repitetive as the plot progresses further but every mission has some challenge which makes it interesting the game becomes more exciting in the end...the final boss battle is the best...so go for it
Happy gaming :)
Comment
